name: The Thieves' Crown
description:
The Thieves' Crown is a top-down 2.5D stealth game. Break into the Kings' castle and steal their most prized possessions, especially their crown. Avoid guards and steal as much gold as you can!

Play as three different thieves, each with very different playstyles:
Beholder, she who sees all.
 Stalker, shrouded in darkness. 
Trickster, makes haste, but no waste.
